about_the_game:
Fuga: Melodies of Steel OST Vol. 1 and Vol. 2 is on sale!

Volume 1 of the Fuga: Melodies of Steel original soundtrack contains a total of 31 tracks from music duo LieN, including the main theme Flower on the Trails, and in-game BGM tracks such as the Japanese versions of Elegy of Winds and Ensemble. (Total play time: 51 minutes, 13 seconds)
Close your eyes and feel the music, reflecting on the life-changing encounter between the children and the Taranis, their battle against the Berman Army, and more.
